statements: SELECT * FROM financial_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM financial_events WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT event_date, user_id, message FROM financial_events WHERE event_type = 'payment';
SELECT event_date FROM financial_events WHERE event_type = 'refund' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT message FROM financial_events WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY user_id ASC, event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_events WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM financial_events WHERE event_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(event_id) AS event_count FROM financial_events GROUP BY user_id HAVING event_count > 5 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date, message FROM financial_events WHERE event_type IN ('sale', 'refund') AND message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT event_type) AS event_types_count FROM financial_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE event_type = 'like' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 'abcd-1234' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 'abcd-5678';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 'efgh-7890' AND event_type = 'comment';
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE event_type = 'share' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE event_type = 'alert' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY notification_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message FROM Notification WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, due_date FROM Loan WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM User ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM User WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT loan_id, amount FROM Loan WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM Notification WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY sent_at ASC;
SELECT u.username, n.message FROM User u JOIN Notification n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.sent_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_repayments FROM loan_repayments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.name, loan_repayments.amount FROM users JOIN loan_repayments ON users.user_id = loan_repayments.user_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, repayment_date FROM loans WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY repayment_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, repayment_date FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT transactions.user_id, transactions.amount, notifications.sent_date FROM transactions JOIN notifications ON transactions.user_id = notifications.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loans FROM loans GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_loans > 5000;
